name: content_accounts_credentials_create
description: Uploads credentials for the Merchant Center account. If credentials already exist for this Merchant Center account and purpose, this method updates them.

accountId.description: Required. The merchant id of the account these credentials belong to.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

AccountCredentials.description: Credentials allowing Google to call a partner's API on behalf of a merchant.

expiresIn.description: The amount of time, in seconds, after which the access token is no longer valid.

purpose.description: Indicates to Google how Google should use these OAuth tokens.

$block: Credentials allowing Google to call a partner's API on behalf of a merchant.

$ul: **expiresIn**: The amount of time, in seconds, after which the access token is no longer valid.
**purpose**: Indicates to Google how Google should use these OAuth tokens.
